name: Unstoppable Spider
description:
A Stealth Game with no Brakes

Unstoppable Spider is a top-down 2D stealth game where you cannot stop. It was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018, which prompted for a game following a genre while leaving out a core mechanic of that genre.

*Warning: this game is hard*

Feel free to play on the browser or download an executable. Mac and Linux versions were not tested.

Controls:

a and b to turn left and right

esc to pause

Credits:

Gahwon Lee
Trent Phan
Amit Sahoo

"Moonlight Hall" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
